array.text: If you agreed to discluse of information to the third party.
When there is a request from the investigating agency and supervisory authority in accordance with the procedures and methods prescribed by the law for investigation

When it is necessary for statistical writing, academic research, or market research, and a specific individual is provided in an unidentifiable form.

wordArray.wordContents: We will get consent from you in a reasonable proecedure in case if we have to provide a thrid party of your personal data for other purposes.

lists.title: Consignment processing of perosnal information by third party
lists.contents: We consign online payment handling of our products to PG(Payment Gateway) companies in regards to credit card payment, account transfer, mobile phone payment, ARS payment etc. Your personal information may be prodivded during this procedure.

lists.title: Period of use and retention of personal information
lists.contents: We delete personal information instantly if you make a request or when there are no reasons to use them. However, the following information is retained for a period spcified for the following reasons.

wordArray.wordContents: Reasons for retaining information under relevant laws

array.text: If it is necessary to preserve the personal information due to the laws and regulations such as Consumer Protection Act in Electronic Commerce, Commercial Law etc, we are required to keep your information for a certain period of time as stipulated in the relevant laws and regulations. It is used only for this preservation purpose and the retention period is as follows.
Records of contract or withdrawal of subscription

array.text: Records of consumer complaints or disputes
depthArray: Reason for preservation: Laws on Consumer Protection in Electronic Commerce

lists.contents: We separately manages the following information for members who do not use or access the company's products for a period of one year from the last access date

wordArray.wordContents: Separately managed information
Personal information collected and managed in the account registration and account modification stages
Information generated in the process of using the product, such as the member's access log, product usage history and payment record

lists.title: Rights of members and legal representatives and how to use them
lists.contents: We separately manages the following information for members who do not use or access the company's services for a period of one year from the last access date

wordArray.wordContents: All members can request to access, modify and withdraw consent of personal information by contacting personal information manager.

If you request correction of an error in personal information, your personal information will not be used or provided until it is amended. In addition, if incorrect personal information has already been provided to a third party, we will notify the third party straight away, so that the correction is made ASAP."

We handle personal information that is canceled or deleted at the request of the user as specified in "5. Period of use and retention of personal information". It cannot be viewed or used in any other purposes.

lists.title: Your obligations
lists.contents: It is your responsibility to protect your own personal information and we are not responsible for leakage of personal information due to your negligence or internet problems.

wordArray.wordContents: It is best to keep your personal information up-to-date, and it is your responsibility if any problems arise from your incorrect update of information.

In accordance with the Resident Registration Act, using somone else's resident registration number is considered as theft and therefore can be punished. This will result in loss of membership and use of our service.

You are responsible for managing your ID, password, etc., and cannot transfer or let others use them. You are obliged to cooperate with periodic change of password in accordance with our information protection policy.
After using our products, it is your responsibility to sign out your account and close the web browser program
Act on Promotion of User Information and Communication Network Utilization and Information Protection

lists.title: Matters concerning the installation, operation and rejection of automatic personal information collection devices

wordArray.wordContents: What are cookies?

array.text: small text files that are stored on your hard drive by a Web server��봳o identify return visitors and their preferences. It enable Web sites to remember preferences to provide customized Web site content
Cookies do not automatically and actively collect personally information, and you may refuse or delete these cookies at any time.

wordArray.wordContents: Purpose of using cookies

array.text: We provide targeted marketing and personalized products through analysis of visit frequency and duration of visitors, grasping visitor's preferences and interests.

wordArray.wordContents: Install, use or reject cookies

array.text: You have a total control over installation of cookies. For instance, you may allow all cookies by setting an option in the web browser, or check every time before a cookie is stored, or refuse to store any cookies.
However, if you refuse to store cookies, there may be difficulties in using the product."

lists.title: We take technical and administrative measures to protect your personal information
lists.contents: We are taking the following technical and administrative measures to ensure stability so that your personal information is not lost, stolen, leaked, tampered with, or damaged when processing user's personal information.

wordArray.wordContents: Countermeasures against hacking

array.text: We are doing our best to prevent the leakage or damage of your personal information from hackers or viruses. To do so, data is backed up from time to time, and the latest vaccine program is used to prevent users' personal information or data from being leaked or damaged, and securely transmit personal information over the network through encrypted communication. In addition, we control unauthorized access from the outside using an intrusion prevention system, and we are trying to equip all possible technical devices to secure security systematically.

wordArray.wordContents: Minimization and training of staffs handling your personal data

array.text: We limit personal information handling only to our personal information management team and we train them regularly to make sure they comply with the privacy policy. if anyone moves out or in to the information management team, we maintain high level of security while the work is being taken over. Anyone misusing the personal information will be held liable for their actions, even after they leave the company.

wordArray.wordContents: Operating dedicated in-house information protection organization

array.text: Through our in-house persoanl information protection organization, any employee joining our company must sign ""security pledge"" to maintain the personal information processing policy. However, we are not responsible for any problems caused by leakage of personal information such as ID and password due to user's negligence or problems on the Internet
